articles.author: Education Desk
articles.title: Bihar Board 10th Result 2022 LIVE Updates: Result to be declared shortly, know how to check scores - The Indian Express
articles.description: Bihar Board 10th Result 2022 LIVE Updates, Sarkari Result 2022 LIVE, Direct Link at biharboardonline.bihar.gov.in: Nearly eight lakh students are waiting for their result of the class 10 board exams that had taken place between February 17 and 24, 2022.
articles.content: Last year, the pass percentage had dropped by nearly two per cent. In 2020, the pass percent was 80.59 while in 2019, the pass percentage was at 80.73 per cent. A total of 16,54,171 students appearedâ€¦ [+165 chars]
